acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable Pojos with non generic collections
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojosWithNonGenericCollections

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithNonGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@dfea3ca elements
Then the Set<?> <span class='step-parameter'>[java.lang.Object@2de83c2c should contain at least one non-empty element
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@4e792ddf elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{java.lang.Object@5fe8810d=java.lang.Object@6def5e22 should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly java.lang.Object@7fa72332=java.lang.Object@53722f45 elements
